topic.title: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY NOT REFERRED FOR OPEN BIOPSY ROUTINE RECALL TOTAL
topic.shortdesc: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY NOT REFERRED FOR OPEN BIOPSY ROUTINE RECALL TOTAL is the total number of women with:a BREAST SCREENING MAMMOGRAPHY OUTCOME CODE recorded as National Code 'Referred for assessment'a REFERRAL REQUEST for PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'NeedleBiopsyfor Cytology (Fine Needle Aspiration or Cytology)' or 'Needle Biopsyfor Histology (Wide Bore Needle or Core Biopsy)' but NOT 'Diagnostic Surgery for Histology (Open Biopsy)'a BREAST ASSESSMENT OUTCOME recorded as National Code 'Routine recall'.

othermeta.content: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY NOT REFERRED FOR OPEN BIOPSY ROUTINE RECALL TOTAL
